message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to let it go for a reasonable price. I'm thinking of $110.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand you're looking to get a good deal, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. How about we try $100?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Would you be willing to consider this price?
I understand you're still looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more move. I'm willing to go up to $102, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Can you meet me there?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not comfortable with $102. I'm willing to meet you at $92. Would you be willing to consider this price?
I understand you're still looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more move. I'm willing to go up to $98, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Can you meet me there?
